alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Box Butte and southeastern Sioux Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 527 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Agate Bed National Monument, or 22 miles northeast of Torrington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Box Butte and southeastern Sioux Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
